author: luarocks
long_description:
# Lift on joinplayer

This simple, any game compatible mod lifts the player up if they are buried
underground upon entering the game.

---

This mod was created in [Rustroot Forge].

All my mods uses [Luanti LSP-API] annotations, [StyLua] and [Luacheck].

[Rustroot Forge]: https://notabug.org/rr
[Luanti LSP-API]: https://notabug.org/rr/luanti_lsp_api
[StyLua]: https://github.com/JohnnyMorganz/StyLua
[Luacheck]: https://github.com/mpeterv/luacheck
name: lift_on_joinplayer
short_description: Lift player up on login until he has no air block under his legs.
title: Lift On Joinplayer
